cards.name: Better
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Upgrade all cards in your hand.
Add *Faster to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Do it Faster
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Next turn, gain [E] [E]
Apply Slow to ALL enemies.
Add *Makes *us *Stronger to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Faster
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Apply Slow to an enemy.
Add *Stronger to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Make it Better
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Upgrade all cards in your hand.
This turn, whenever you draw a card, upgrade it.
Add *Do *it *Faster to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Makes us Stronger
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 6 Strength.
Gain 6 Strength at the start of your turn.

cards.name: One Strike
cards.description:
Kill a non-boss enemy.
Fleeting.

cards.name: One Strike Plus Ultra
cards.description:
Kill a non-boss enemy.
Realize you wasted an [#FFFFFF]upgrade[].
Fleeting.

cards.name: Stronger
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 4 Strength at the start of your turn.

cards.name: Fear
cards.description:
Add 2 *Angers to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Fear+
cards.description:
Add 2 upgraded *Angers to your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Collector's Strike
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
jedi:Collective 3.

cards.name: Collector's Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
jedi:Collective 4.

cards.name: Controlled Anger
cards.description:
Add 2 *Angers to your hand.
Whenever you play an *Anger, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Controlled Anger+
cards.description:
Add 2 Upgraded *Angers to your hand.
Whenever you play an *Anger, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Hate
cards.description:
Exhaust all *Angers in your discard pile and deal 5 damage for each.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Hate+
cards.description: Exhaust all *Angers in your discard pile and deal 7 damage for each.

cards.name: Makeshift Sword
cards.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal 4 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Makeshift Sword+
cards.description: Whenever a card is created during combat, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Suffering
cards.description:
For each Attack Exhausted, deal 2 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Suffering+
cards.description:
For each Attack Exhausted, deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bloody Hammer
cards.description:
Lose 8 HP.
Permanently upgrade a card in your hand.
Purge.

cards.name: Bloody Hammer+
cards.description:
Lose 8 HP.
Permanently upgrade a card in your hand.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Harder
cards.description:
Gain 2 Plated Armor.
Add *Better to your hand.

cards.name: Strikeing Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Play a random Strike on the same enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Strikeing Strike+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Play a random upgraded Strike on the same enemy.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Unlimited Power
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
jedi:Unlimited.

cards.name: Unlimited Power+1
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
jedi:Unlimited.

cards.name: Work it Harder
cards.description:
Gain 2 Metallicize.
Gain 2 Plated Armor.
Add *Make *it *Better to your hand.

cards.name: Pocket Poison
cards.description: Apply 3 Poison.

cards.name: Pocket Poison+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Acid Rain
cards.description: Apply 2 Poison for each card discarded this turn.

cards.name: Acid Rain+
cards.description: Apply 3 Poison for each card discarded this turn.

cards.name: Collector's Venom
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
jedi:Collective !jedi:SecondMN!.

cards.name: Collector's Venom+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
jedi:Collective !jedi:SecondMN!.

cards.name: Poison Ivy
cards.description: Whenever you attack a Poisoned enemy with a non-Shiv card, add 1 Shiv to your hand.

cards.name: Poison Ivy+
cards.description:
Innate.
Whenever you attack a Poisoned enemy with a non-Shiv card, add 1 Shiv to your hand.

cards.name: Unstable Fumes
cards.description:
Apply 2 Poison.
If this card is discarded from your hand, apply !jedi:SecondMN! Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Unstable Fumes+
cards.description:
Apply 4 Poison.
If this card is discarded from your hand, apply !jedi:SecondMN! Poison to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Brewing Poison
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Exhaust.
Whenever you draw this card, increase its Poison by !jedi:SecondMN!.
Whenever you discard this card, double its Poison.

cards.name: Brewing Poison+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Poison.
Exhaust.
Whenever you draw this card, increase its Poison by !jedi:SecondMN!.
Whenever you discard this card, double its Poison.

cards.name: Storm of Toxin
cards.description:
Discard your hand.
Apply 3 Poison for each card discarded.

cards.name: Storm of Toxin+
cards.description:
Discard any number of cards.
Apply 4 Poison for each card discarded.

cards.name: Study Poison
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Poison-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Study Poison+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Poison-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Study Shivs
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Shivs-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Study Shivs+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Shivs-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Block-On
cards.description:
Gain 6 Block.
Apply 1 Lock-On to each enemy that intends to attack.

cards.name: Block-On+
cards.description:
Gain 9 Block.
Apply 2 Lock-On to each enemy that intends to attack.

cards.name: Burst Frost
cards.description:
Gain 8 Block.
Gain additional Block equal to your Focus.

cards.name: Burst Frost+
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Gain additional Block equal to your Focus times 2.

cards.name: Burst Lightning
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Focus.
Is affected by *Electrodynamics.

cards.name: Burst Lightning+
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to your Focus times 2.
Is affected by *Electrodynamics.

cards.name: Hex
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On.
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Apply 1 Weak.

cards.name: Hex+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lock-On.
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Apply 2 Weak.

cards.name: Lock'N'Load
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lock-On.
Channel 2 Lightning.

cards.name: Lock'N'Load+
cards.description:
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Channel 3 Lightning.

cards.name: Mark of Death
cards.description:
Apply 99 Lock-On.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mark of Death+
cards.description:
Apply 99 Lock-On.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Overflow
cards.description: If you have no empty Orb slots, gain 1 Orb slot.

cards.name: Overflow+
cards.description:
If you have no empty Orb slots, gain 1 Orb slot.
Otherwise, Channel 1 random Orb.

cards.name: Reiji
cards.description:
Innate.
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Reiji+
cards.description:
Innate.
Apply 3 Lock-On.
Channel 1 Lightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Sharpshooter
cards.description:
Deal 5 damage.
If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Sharpshooter+
cards.description:
Deal 8 damage.
If enemy has Lock-On, gain [E] and draw a card.

cards.name: Spot Bugs
cards.description: If the enemy intends to buff, gain 1 Orb slot.

cards.name: Spot Bugs+
cards.description:
If the enemy intends to buff, gain 1 Orb slot and
Channel 1 random Orb.

cards.name: Bruteforce
cards.description:
Evoke your rightmost Lightning Orb till it hits selected enemy 3 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Bruteforce+
cards.description:
Evoke your rightmost Lightning Orb till it hits selected enemy 4 times.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Burst Dark
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Whenever you Evoke an Orb with this card in hand, increase its damage by 5 until played.

cards.name: Burst Dark+
cards.description:
Retain.
Deal 6 damage.
Whenever you Evoke an Orb with this card in hand, increase its damage by 5 until played.

cards.name: Darkness Call
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP.
Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Darkness Call+
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On to an enemy with lowest HP.
Evoke your rightmost Dark Orb.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gathering Storm
cards.description:
For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Gathering Storm+
cards.description:
For each non-Lightning orb Channeled this combat, Channel 1 Lightning.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Meditation
cards.description:
Gain 1 Focus at the end of your turn.
Lose ALL Focus whenever you lose HP.

cards.name: Meditation+
cards.description:
Gain 2 Focus at the end of your turn.
Lose ALL Focus whenever you lose HP.

cards.name: Ready, Aim, Fire
cards.description:
Apply 1 Lock-On to ALL enemies.
Evoke ALL orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Ready, Aim, Fire+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Lock-On to ALL enemies.
Evoke ALL orbs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Study Frost
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Frost-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn. Exhaust.

cards.name: Study Frost+
cards.description: Choose 1 of 3 random Frost-related cards to add into your hand. It costs 0 this turn.

cards.name: Deepen Needles
cards.description:
Deal 7 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to enemy *Marks.

cards.name: Deepen Needles+
cards.description:
Deal 10 damage.
Deals additional damage equal to enemy *Marks.

cards.name: Mang's Elixir
cards.description:
Remove all *Marks.
Heal 1 HP for every 3 *Marks removed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Mang's Elixir+
cards.description:
Remove all *Marks.
Heal 1 HP for every 2 *Marks removed.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Needle Toss
cards.description:
Deal 3 damage.
Apply 2 *Marks.

cards.name: Needle Toss+
cards.description:
Deal 4 damage.
Apply 3 *Marks.

cards.name: Nirvanic Rebirth
cards.description:
Retain.
Heal 2 HP.
When Retained, permanently increase its healing by !jedi:SecondMN!.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Nirvanic Rebirth+
cards.description:
Retain.
Heal 2 HP.
When Retained, permanently increase its healing by !jedi:SecondMN!.
Fleeting.

cards.name: Force Pull
cards.description:
Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Force Pull+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Vulnerable.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Force Push
cards.description:
Apply 1 Weak.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Force Push+
cards.description:
Apply 2 Weak.
Draw a card.

cards.name: Cleanse
cards.description:
Remove ALL your debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Cleanse+
cards.description:
Retain.
Remove ALL your debuffs.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leeching Strike
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage.
Heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leeching Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leeching Strike
cards.description:
Deal 9 damage.
Heal HP equal to unblocked damage dealt.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Red Incense
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you discard, Exhaust or Scry this card, gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Red Incense+
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever you discard, Exhaust or Scry this card, gain 2 Strength.

cards.name: Battle Thirst
cards.description:
Unplayable.
While in your deck, you have to enter combat rooms whenever you can.

cards.name: Frostbite
cards.description:
Unplayable.
Whenever this card is drawn, lose 3 Strength this turn.

cards.name: The Dog
cards.description:
Unplayable. Retain.
Cannot be removed from your hand.

relics.name: Endoplasm
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. The first time you lose HP each round, lose 50 Gold. Whenever you lose HP outside of combat, lose 50 Gold.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Lead-Lined Bottle
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Start each combat with this card at the bottom of your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Strike Manual
relics.description: All Strikes deal 4 additional damage.
relics.flavorText: This relic is deprecated.

relics.name: Crown of Simplicity
relics.description: First Basic card each turn is played twice.
relics.flavorText: An extremely simple crown for an extremely simple purpose.

relics.name: Laser Pointer
relics.description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Lock-On to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Why is it a pointer if it targets everyone?

relics.name: Portable Tent
relics.description: You can now encounter Rest sites in ? rooms.
relics.flavorText: Seems to be made of snecko skin, doused in slime goop. Offers long-term restorative effects.

relics.name: Rubber Sling
relics.description: First time each turn when you discard a card, draw a card.
relics.flavorText: I thought they don't use rubber in yoyo?

relics.name: Shrink Ray
relics.description: Non-boss enemies have 10% less HP.
relics.flavorText: An evil mastermind has once tried to steal a satellite with this very relic...

relics.name: Angry Mask
relics.description: Whenever you spend any Gold at a shop, start the next combat with 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Is this what they call "Aggressive marketing"?

relics.name: Archwizard's Hat
relics.description: Whenever an Attack that costs 1 or more uses all of your current energy, increase its damage by 25%.
relics.flavorText: Bakuretsu, bakuretsu, la la la...

relics.name: Blood Pack
relics.description:
When you would lose HP from non-Attack damage, lose 1 less.
Cannot reduce below 1.
relics.flavorText: Nope it was always like this.

relics.name: Bottled Fury
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose a card. Whenever an enemy dies, Fetch this card from anywhere.
relics.flavorText: I will be very sad if you put in something like Bandage Up and will just spam it to heal to full every possible time.

relics.name: Catwich
relics.description: The first unupgraded card you discard each turn is Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Infinite energy here we go.

relics.name: Ghost Blades
relics.description: Shivs ignore enemy Block.
relics.flavorText: There's something strange... In the neighbourhood...

relics.name: Heavy Jacket
relics.description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Plated Armor for every 2 relics you have.
relics.flavorText: That's a lot of pockets for a single jacket.

relics.name: Iron Blood
relics.description: Whenever you would lose HP, take that much damage instead.
relics.flavorText: It may be a worse Potato, but it sure is a better Velvet Choker.

relics.name: Paper Faux
relics.description: Enemies with Lock-On take 75% more damage rather than 50%.
relics.flavorText: What does it say?

relics.name: Pinwheel
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your deck, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Seems to be spinning despite complete lack of wind.

relics.name: Scrap Metal
relics.description: Shivs deal 1 additional damage for each Shiv played during the turn.
relics.flavorText: Nothing should go to waste.

relics.name: Sprinkler
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, apply 3 Poison to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Taking care of those nasty insects has never been so easy!

relics.name: Superconductor
relics.description: For every 10 Orbs Channeled, trigger passive effect of ALL Orbs.
relics.flavorText: You can almost hear orbs going round and round...

relics.name: Tarot deck
relics.description:
The first time you create a card during combat:
If it's an Attack - gain 2 Strength.
If it's a Skill - gain 2 Dexterity.
If it's a Power - heal 4 HP.
If it's a Status - Exhaust it and all future Status cards this turn.
If it's a Curse - raise your Max HP by 1.
relics.flavorText: They say drawing from this deck reads your fate. Or does it determine it?

relics.name: First Aid Kit
relics.description: Whenever you take unblocked attack damage, gain 2 Regen.
relics.flavorText: Do you really need a bandage for every byrd peck?

relics.name: Gremlin Knob
relics.description: Whenever you play a Skill, gain 1 Strength until the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: If I hear ONE MORE knock-knock joke...

relics.name: Kaleidoscope
relics.description: Start each combat with Strength equal to unique card colors in your deck.
relics.flavorText: It seems to be lacking its main shard...

relics.name: Matchstick
relics.description:
Right click during combat to activate.
Usable once per combat [REMOVE_SPACE].
Gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: The match is struck. A blazing star is born!

relics.name: Purple Fairy
relics.description: Whenever you Smith a card, heal HP depending on card rarity.
relics.flavorText: Mai waifu.

relics.name: Command
relics.description: Instead of random you always choose which relic to obtain.
relics.flavorText: There is no rain inside the Spire.

relics.name: Command (boss)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any boss relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (common)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any common relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (rare)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any rare relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (shop)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any shop relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Command (uncommon)
relics.description: Upon pickup, choose and obtain any uncommon relic.
relics.flavorText: ASSUMING DIRECT CONTROL

relics.name: Equalizer
relics.description: Increases damage and Block from basic and common cards by 25%. Reduces damage and Block from other cards by 25%.
relics.flavorText: You're equally as lucky to get this relic as you're unlucky you could've bought a different one.

relics.name: Lucky Charm
relics.description: Start each combat with 1 Strength and Dexterity for each cursed relic you hold.
relics.flavorText: If this works you're truly lucky to stay alive.

relics.name: Scales of Toshan
relics.description: Increases damage and Block from unupgraded cards by 25%. Reduces damage and Block from upgraded cards by 25%.
relics.flavorText: Perfectly balanced, as all things should be.

relics.name: Token of Glory
relics.description: Elites appear more often in future acts.
relics.flavorText: You're feeling an ominous presence...

relics.name: Token of Mystery
relics.description: ? rooms appear more often in future acts.

relics.name: Token of Serenity
relics.description: Rest sites appear more often in future acts.
relics.flavorText: Hush now, quiet now, it's time to lay your sleepy head...

relics.name: Token of Wealth
relics.description: Shops appear more often in future acts.
relics.flavorText: The price you pay.

relics.name: Zontanonomicon
relics.description: The first Skill played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice.
relics.flavorText: You feel invigorated just by holding this Book of Living.

relics.name: Battle Standard
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You have to enter combat rooms whenever you can.
relics.flavorText: To battle! Fight! Fight for your life!

relics.name: Hot Pepper
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Upon pickup, reduce your Max HP by 25%. Further Max HP increase effects are reduced by 50%
relics.flavorText: Not only it burns your mouth when you eat it, it also leaves a horrible aftertaste so that any food after it doesn't taste well.

relics.name: Paper Lyon
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn. When Vulnerable, take 75% more attack damage rather than 50%. When Weak, deal 40% less attack damage rather than 25%.
Synergy: Odd Mushroom
relics.flavorText: It may only be made of paper, yet it gives such an intimidating aura.

relics.name: Ash Lotus
relics.description: At the end of your turn, if you have no cards left in your hand, draw and discard piles, gain Block equal to the number of cards in your exhaust pile size plus 30 and deal that much damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Welcome home, Ashen Two...

relics.name: Crying Mask
relics.description:
The Merchant's card removal service can now be purchased twice per shop for the same price.
Synergy: Smiling Mask
relics.flavorText: Mask worn by the Merchant of the past... Or is it of the future?

relics.name: Fake Mustache
relics.description: When spending Gold at the shop, heal 5 HP. Heal 10 HP upon pickup.
relics.flavorText: A familiar face?

relics.name: Ominous Loan Note
relics.description: Upon pickup receive a large sum of gold. All gold gained, with interest, will go toward paying off this debt.
relics.flavorText: You pay for your greed.

relics.name: Wind-up Box
relics.description: Increases effectiveness of all time-based relics.
relics.flavorText: Like clockwork.

potions.name: Striking Potion
potions.description: Choose 1 of 3 random cards containing "Strike" to add to your hand, it costs 0 this turn.

potions.name: Energy drink
potions.description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to once.

potions.name: Hoard Potion
potions.description: Add all cards from current card reward screen to your deck.

potions.name: Mystery Potion
potions.description:
The next room you can go to, other than bosses, becomes a ? room.
Cannot be used in The Ending.

keywords.name: [B]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [E]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [G]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [R]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: [W]
keywords.description: Energy is used to play cards from your hand.

keywords.name: Artifact
keywords.description: Negates the next debuff.

keywords.name: Autoplay
keywords.description: This card automatically plays itself when drawn.

keywords.name: Block
keywords.description: Until next turn, prevents damage.

keywords.name: Burn
keywords.description: Burns are unplayable status cards that damage you.

keywords.name: Calm
keywords.description: Upon exiting this Stance, gain [W] [W] .

keywords.name: Channel
keywords.description: Channeling an Orb puts it into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, your first Orb is automatically Evoked to make room.

keywords.name: Confused
keywords.description: Whenever you draw a card, randomize its cost.

keywords.name: Curse
keywords.description: Curse cards are negative cards that stay in your deck.

keywords.name: Dark
keywords.description: Orb: Increases damage every turn. When Evoked, deals damage to the enemy with the least HP.

keywords.name: Dazed
keywords.description: Dazed are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Dexterity
keywords.description: Dexterity improves Block gained from cards.

keywords.name: Divinity
keywords.description: Upon entering this stance, gain [W] [W] [W] . Attacks deal triple damage. Exit this Stance at the start of your next turn.

keywords.name: Ethereal
keywords.description: If this card is in your hand at the end of turn, it is exhausted. Exhausted cards are removed from your deck until the end of combat.

keywords.name: Evoke
keywords.description: Consume your rightmost Orb and use its Evoke effect.

keywords.name: Exhaust
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat.

keywords.name: Exhaustive
keywords.description: Exhausts after a certain number of uses.

keywords.name: Fatal
keywords.description: Triggers whenever this card kills a non-minion enemy.

keywords.name: Fetch
keywords.description: Choose a specified card from a specified pile and place it into your hand.

keywords.name: Fleeting
keywords.description: This card Purges and is removed from your deck on use.

keywords.name: Focus
keywords.description: Focus increases the effectiveness of Channeled Orbs.

keywords.name: Frail
keywords.description: While Frail, gain 25% less Block from cards.

keywords.name: Frost
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Block.

keywords.name: Grave
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your discard pile.

keywords.name: Innate
keywords.description: Start each combat with this card in your hand.

keywords.name: Intangible
keywords.description: Reduce ALL damage taken and HP loss to 1.

keywords.name: Jedi:better
keywords.description: A card that upgrades ALL cards in hand and adds Faster to your hand.

keywords.name: Jedi:chaos
keywords.description: Randomizes cost and effects of certain cards when drawn.

keywords.name: Jedi:collective
keywords.description: Increase the value of a card in your deck with the same name by the Collective amount on it, instead of obtaining this card. You are more likely to find this card in future card rewards the higher the value is.

keywords.name: Jedi:constricted
keywords.description: A debuff that deals damage at the end of creature's turn. If the enemy is constricted, it will do its move first and then take damage from constriction.

keywords.name: Jedi:faster
keywords.description: A card that applies Slow to an enemy (ALL enemies on upgrade) and adds Stronger to your hand.

keywords.name: Jedi:stronger
keywords.description: A power that gives you Strength every turn.

keywords.name: Jedi:unlimited
keywords.description:
When played, remains in hand and Upgrades.
Can be upgraded any number of times.
Reset upgrades at the end of your turn.
Cannot be upgraded outside of combat.

keywords.name: Lightning
keywords.description: Orb: Deals damage to random enemies.

keywords.name: Lock-on
keywords.description: Lock-On targets receive 50% more damage from Orbs.

keywords.name: Locked
keywords.description: This card has yet to be unlocked.

keywords.name: Mantra
keywords.description: When you obtain 10 Mantra, enter Divinity.

keywords.name: Opener
keywords.description: Opener cards may only be played as the first card each turn.

keywords.name: Plasma
keywords.description: Orb: Gains Energy.

keywords.name: Poison
keywords.description: Poisoned creatures lose HP at the start of their turn. Each turn, Poison is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Purge
keywords.description: Removed until end of combat. Does NOT go to your exhaust pile.

keywords.name: Refund
keywords.description: Returns energy spent on playing the card, up to the Refund value.

keywords.name: Regen
keywords.description: Regen heals HP at the end of your turn. Each turn, Regen is reduced by 1.

keywords.name: Retain
keywords.description: Not discarded at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Ritual
keywords.description: Gain Strength at the end of your turn.

keywords.name: Scry
keywords.description: Look at the top X cards of your draw pile. You may discard any of them.

keywords.name: Shiv
keywords.description: Shivs are 0 cost Attack cards which Exhaust.

keywords.name: Snecko
keywords.description: When drawn, this card randomizes its cost.

keywords.name: Soulbound
keywords.description: Cannot be removed from your deck.

keywords.name: Stance
keywords.description: You can only have one stance at a time.

keywords.name: Startup
keywords.description: Triggers at the start of each combat.

keywords.name: Status
keywords.description: Status cards are removed at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Strength
keywords.description: Strength adds additional damage to attacks.

keywords.name: Strike
keywords.description: Any card with the word "Strike" in its name.

keywords.name: Temporary hp
keywords.description: Temporary HP disappears at the end of combat.

keywords.name: Thorns
keywords.description: When receiving Attack damage, deals damage back.

keywords.name: Transform
keywords.description: Transformed cards become a random card of any rarity.

keywords.name: Unknown
keywords.description: This card has yet to be encountered.

keywords.name: Unplayable
keywords.description: Unplayable cards cannot be played from your hand.

keywords.name: Upgrade
keywords.description: Upgrading cards makes them more powerful. Cards can only be upgraded once.

keywords.name: Vigor
keywords.description: Your next Attack deals additional damage.

keywords.name: Void
keywords.description: Voids are unplayable status cards that consume energy when drawn.

keywords.name: Vulnerable
keywords.description: Vulnerable creatures take 50% more damage from Attacks.

keywords.name: Weak
keywords.description: Weakened creatures deal 25% less damage with Attacks.

keywords.name: Wound
keywords.description: Wounds are unplayable status cards.

keywords.name: Wrath
keywords.description: In this Stance, you deal and receive double attack damage.
